description:
After exhausting the main rivers and brooks of the Cobequid Hills, I started to explore the smaller tributaries.  The Chiganois river has lots of falls and even a small slot canyon, I expected that a tributary of it might contain some hidden gems.

From the logging road, follow your gps until it points away from the road and bushwack to the stream.  Plunge into the ravine and discover 2 20ft falls.
directions: Onslow Mountain Road.  Turn on Old Tatamagouche Road.  Drive until a seconday road appears on your left at; 45°29'24.3"N 63°18'26.7"W.  Turn on that road and then turn right after a few hundred feet.  Drive as far as you can and then follow gps to an area around; 45°29'24.3"N 63°18'26.7"W
title: East Branch Tributary Chiganois River Falls
